response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und missbrauchen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and misusing personal data, while also highlighting the importance of data privacy, privacy, and security. the hashtags used are popular ones related to these topics, which can help increase the visibility of the post and attract like-minded individuals who are concerned about data privacy.
